entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You've been a great help in putting down the Tuskan raids. Mos Eisley is a bit safer because of you.
entries.journal_entry_description: The Tusken raids have been getting worse and they need your help to put them down.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Well done! Now I need you to take out some of their Soldiers. They're a bit further out from Junktown and they're a bit tougher, but I think you can do it.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: You've shown promise as a fine city defender. Purvis wants you to take out five Tusken Soldiers this time. They are further out from Junktown.
